title: Kick-off meeting
text: Initial project meeting with stakeholders to gather requirements and set expectations.

title: System architecture design
text: Design the system architecture and select appropriate technologies.

title: Frontend development
text: Develop the user interface of the web application.

title: Backend development
text: Set up servers, databases, and APIs.

title: QA and Testing
text: Quality assurance tests and bug fixing.

title: User training
text: Train the users on how to use the new system.

title: Feedback loop
text: Gather feedback from users for the first month after deployment.

title: Optimization
text: Optimize the system based on user feedback.

title: Project wrap-up
text: Final meeting to officially close the project and handover to the maintenance team.
